answers.answer: Hi Everyone.  My favorite snacks (though I don't usually snack) are macadamia nuts, cream cheese, regular cheese, boiled eggs.The Sugar sense app has also got great ideas.
If you're coming up empty on ideas, here's how to build a snack that's diabetes-friendly:http://www.medhelp.org/diabetes/articles/Smart-Diabetes-Snacking/1764

question: Eating more regularly helps some people balance their blood sugar. What healthy, between-meal munchies do you go to when a craving strikes? Here's one to try: a 1-ounce stick of string cheese with a handful of strawberries. It's only 100 calories and 4 grams of carbs! Check out some other ideas here and on our Sugar Sense app!http://www.medhelp.org/nutrition/articles/4-Filling-100-Calorie-Snacks/2435
title: Diabetes Month: What's your favorite diabetes-friendly snack?
